source.query:
SELECT
	{ [Measures].[3UCCYRTVUJ3021VGIRIMPN4ZU],
	[Measures].[3UCCYS1KDHOPKOEWOLKYZP3PM] } ON COLUMNS,
	NON EMPTY
	{ [0CUSTOMER].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GROUP].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GRP5].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [0DIVISION].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZAFUNDID].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZAFUNDID__ZFUNDTYPE].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZALLOCID].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZAPROMOID].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZAPROMOID__ZPRENDDT].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
                [ZAPROMOID__ZPRSTRTDT].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS,
				[ZFPAYMENT].[LEVEL01].MEMBERS
               } ON ROWS
FROM ZCPM_M64/ZCPM_M64_Q040
CELL PROPERTIES VALUE SAP VARIABLES [ZI_FUNPE] INCLUDING [ZFEFFYR].[2019] : [ZFEFFYR].[2019] [ZM_CUSTG] 
INCLUDING [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GROUP].[01]
[Z_CUSTR] INCLUDING [0CUSTOMER].[0001910803]
[0DIVISIO] INCLUDING [0DIVISION].[13]
